name: Bubble Shooter - Rescue Bird
description:
As a classic game is popular at all over the world. With bubble and ball shooter is a very funny and happy game.
Play it with your family to try more challenging.
- a super pet feed system. You can feed your own bird and dress up it.
- 500+ funny and challenging game levels, Do you want to challenge your brain?
- Fluent shooting experience.

Do not miss your shooting - do not forget to rescue the birds
Thanks & Enjoy
